events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this item is not what I ordered.
The issue has been classified under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Alex has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect product delivery.
Hello! I’m Alex from customer support, and I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the product I got which is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund for your order and provide you with a prepaid return label to send the incorrect item back.
That sounds good to me, thanks for the quick response! I really appreciate the prepaid label for the return.
Your refund has been processed successfully and the return label has been emailed to you. Please ship the incorrect product at your earliest convenience.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and the return process was smooth. Let us know if you have any other questions or concerns.
As we have not heard back from you, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us again if you need further assistance.
We have sent a brief satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback is important in helping us improve our service.
